definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且幾項科學研究也表明，雞湯的確具有藥用價值。

sentences.english: These facilities aided his scientific studies.
sentences.chinese: 這些設備有助於他的科學研究。

sentences.english: Pavlov's theory had an extensive and profound influence on study of psychology.
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫學說對心理科學研究的影響廣泛而深刻。

sentences.english: To develope the scientific study and scientific popularization of the forest park.
sentences.chinese: 積極開展森林公園的科學研究和科學普及工作。

sentences.english: In the ages of Big Science, any science research cannot be done without collaboration.
sentences.chinese: 在當今大科學時代，任何科學研究都離不開科研合作。

sentences.english: So the accuracy of data can be fit to the ocean forecast and other scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 數據精度滿足海洋預報和其他科學研究的需要。

sentences.english: "0" signal method is a scientific research method in physics.
sentences.chinese: 零位測量法是一種源自於物理實驗中的科學研究方法。

sentences.english: Soon they found their scientific reseaches were not progressing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 不久他們發現他們的科學研究工作進展得並不順利。

sentences.english: The reform experiment inspects the way, raises student's scientific research and innovation ability.
sentences.chinese: 更始嘗試查覈體例，培育學生的科學研究與立異能力。

sentences.english: Adatom diffusions is a primary task in the thin film research field.
sentences.chinese: 表面原子的擴散是薄膜科學研究的重點內容之一。

sentences.english: Formulation of curriculum is a complex and comprehensive process of scientific study.
sentences.chinese: 課程的編訂是一項複雜的綜合性的科學研究。

sentences.english: Based on analogy reasoning a method of analysing automatic control system was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 類比推理是科學研究中一種重要的手段之一。

sentences.english: I think that it makes it hard for that particular area of scientific research to go forward.
sentences.chinese: 我想在這方面的科學研究很難推進。

sentences.english: Overtraining is one of the important topics in modern athletic training.
sentences.chinese: 過度訓練問題一直是體育科學研究中的重要課題之一。

sentences.english: And it has also, subliminally , affected research.
sentences.chinese: 並一直對科學研究有着潛在的影響。
科學研究應該以問題爲中心。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
